title: Supreme Court likely will not hear appeal

content.prompt: When a lower court decision is appealed to the Supreme Court, which of the following is most likely to occur?

choices.label: The Supreme Court will reconsider the case, and overturn the lower court decision.
The Supreme Court will reprimand the lower court judge for improperly deciding the case.
The plaintiffs or defendents will file motions for a change of venue.
The case will be retried at the lower court level.
The Supreme Court will not hear the appeal.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
